QueryList.Query: FROM HouseInfo A WHERE 1=1 <#if address??> and A.address=:address </#if> <#if id??> and A.id=:id </#if> <#if remark??> and A.remark=:remark </#if> <#if status??> and A.status=:status </#if> <#if image??> and A.image=:image </#if> <#if longitude??> and A.longitude=:longitude </#if> <#if master??> and A.master=:master </#if> <#if title??> and A.title=:title </#if> <#if traffic??> and A.traffic=:traffic </#if> <#if area??> and A.area=:area </#if> <#if bed??> and A.bed=:bed </#if> <#if pledge??> and A.pledge=:pledge </#if> <#if latitude??> and A.latitude=:latitude </#if> <#if count??> and A.count=:count </#if> <#if price??> and A.price=:price </#if> <#if facility??> and A.facility=:facility </#if>
